entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nicolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nicolet 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
